product_name: Outdoor Research PL Sensor Gloves - Men's
long_description: Toasty warm in the bitter cold, the smooth-faced, touch-screen-compatible Outdoor Research PL Sensor Gloves with Radiant Fleece(TM) are ideal companions for long days in the backcountry. Polyester fleece is lightweight, breathable, wicking and water-resistant; gloves fit easily underneath shell gloves or mittens (sold separately). Conductive suede tips on the thumbs and index fingers allow for the use of touch-screen devices. Silicone grip on the palms ensures you have a good hold of your phone.
